definition: Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: But their words helped pierce the concrete and concertina wire of the Iron Curtain.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些话穿透了铁幕的水泥墙和铁丝网。

sentences.english: A new Iron Curtain is being drawn around Russia.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯周围正拉起新的铁幕。

definition: East Germany (1945-1990)/German Democratic Republic 德意志民主共和國|德意志民主共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2]
Yellow Peril, political novel by Wang Lixiong 王力雄[Wang2 Li4 xiong2]
yellow peril (offensive term referring to the perceived threat to Western nations, of immigration or military expansion from East Asian nations)
East and West Germany/refers to the German Democratic Republic (East Germany) and the Federal Republic of Germany (West Germany)
cage used to hold or transport prisoners
